programme.title: 500th letter
programme.short_synopsis: How the series Letter from America began in 1946, and how America has changed since.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke remembers Lindsay Wellington, the BBC head who came up with the idea of weekly letters to help people in the UK understand American life in 1946.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: 500th letter

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
